title: R package qgisprocess: using QGIS processing algorithms from R
description: The R package qgisprocess provides seamless access to the QGIS (https://qgis.org/en/site/) processing toolbox using the standalone ‘qgis_process’ command-line utility. Both native and third-party (plugin) processing providers are supported. Beside referring data sources from file, also common R-objects like sf, terra and stars objects are supported. URL: https://r-spatial.github.io/qgisprocess.
